summary: The lives, loves, and battles of fictional characters in the Army's First Ranger Battalion during WWII.
cast: James Garner|Etchika Choureau|Jack Warden|Edd Byrnes|Venetia Stevenson|Torin Thatcher|Peter Brown|Joan Elan|Corey Allen|Stuart Whitman|Murray Hamilton|William Wellman Jr.|Andrea King|Adam Williams|Frieda Inescort|Reginald Owen|Philip Tonge|Edward Ashley|Raymond Bailey|Willis Bouchey|Phil Adams|Marian Collier|Edward Colmans|James De Closs|Francis De Sales|Reggie Dvorak|Sean Garrison|Michael Gibson|Frank Gifford|Norman Grabowski|Thomas Browne Henry|William Hudson|Miguel Ángel Landa|John Marlin|Jerry May|John McKee|Tom McKee|Michael Pierce|Mike Ragan|Juli Reding|Isabella Rye|Joel Smith|Allegra Varron|Tom Watson
title: Los jóvenes invasores
